content.label: But still fin
Our whole family loves to play with our ipads
With the new update, the game runs slow. The game speed option will not work.

Update 6 months later, new ipad still doesnt work, lots of sever and connection problems, and support appears nonexistent. Lowering to 1 star.

Update 2020: great game but have a new iPad with iOS 13.3 and it is completely unplayable, works pretty well on my old ipad

Update March 2016: ignore the folks shilling for the company, months later there are lots of bugs ... Just failed 3 times in 30 minutes.

Previous release wrecked a great game.

This minor update has proved even less reliable - I'll join games and it will freeze and never start, or crash during play.

title.label: Good but only a basic tutorial

content.label: If you like the board game you will like this. The only problem is there are no instructions past the basic game. There are game variations but no tutorials for them. Also a legend that explains what all the icons mean would be nice.

The game keeps making me draw a ‚Äúsecond‚Äù ticket.....but I never tried to select a first!  

Keeps happening, particularly on the last turn.  I go to lay track and the game prevents me stating I need to draw the second ticket.  

It happens mid-game as well.  Very frustrating and unfair!  

Please fix

Otherwise...love the app....except I would like to select my own game color.

title.label: Fun game, but lots of crashes

content.label:
The game itself is fun and I like being able to play all the different versions. It could be more intuitive, but I get that it‚Äôs hard to translate a tabletop game into a great app and once you get the hang of it, it‚Äôs fine. 

The reason I‚Äôm only giving two stars is that the app crashes all.the.time. At least 5-10 times per game it crashes or gets caught in a loop. Lots of time out errors too. 

Fun game, but I wish it was less buggy.

I enjoy this game, but as someone who is color blind I have trouble playing as the color spaces on the board are not labled with the symbols for each color like the board game. It really ruins the experience for me.
I used to love the app, but it‚Äôs started crashing every time I try to load a solo game. I‚Äôm using an 2020 iPad Air and I‚Äôm really disappointed. Please fix.
You are playing this game one moment and the next thing you know, you lose connection and you cannot reconnect no matter what you do. So disappointed in this game üòï

title.label: 5-Stars vs Human, 1 Solo DON‚ÄôT BUY FOR SOLO!

content.label:
This a very slick and well-thought-out version of the board game. My wife and I play on our local network and we nearly always have great close games.

However, when I have to play a solo game there is not the slightest illusion that I am playing a sentient being. The AI is consistently beatable while maintaining some degree of challenge, so that‚Äôs not the problem. It‚Äôs the transparent ‚Äúcheating‚Äù that makes it mostly too frustrating to play. 

The game has ‚Äúchoke points‚Äù for certain routes. The AI, unlike a human opponent, knows your routes and magically produces the card colors to close off those essential choke points out of the blue. Also, you can count on the AI magically having six matching cards for +15 points on the last turn. 

I understand that the AI is not going to be able to play like a human opponent: getting stuck with lousy routes; at the mercy of card draws; using complex and adaptive strategy; and mostly ignorant of the other player‚Äôs goals and resources, especially early on. But blatant ‚Äúcheating‚Äù turns the solo game into an exercise in frustration. They need to come up with something more sophisticated than ‚Äúoh, he‚Äôs got to get from Miami to LA so I‚Äôll just block that route and any efforts to get around them.‚Äù
Love the board game. Somehow it gets better on this digital version!!!

title.label: Great version of the tabletop game

content.label:
I actually love TTR on the app because the gameplay is so much faster than playing on the board at home. 

Rating is short a star because the animation speed is constantly resetting itself back to the slowest setting.
Greatest game ever. Always makes me feeling good and wanting more. :)
We enjoy playing with family all across the country or solo games! Great app!
The game board and game app are pretty much the same, and more very addicting. I have both and my family love the app because it‚Äôs faster, more games in before bed!
If you‚Äôve played the board game this is an easy transfer.  Not a ton of strategy but a little. Kind of fun to learn cities in other countries. App works pretty well too.

title.label: Love the gameplay hate the menu

content.label: Very fun and enjoyable game. However on my iPhone SE 2020 it crashes on menu constantly. Once a game is going it‚Äôs fine. But the menu system is completely broken. Shame because it‚Äôs a great game. Will update my review once fixed
Why did you change the layout??? It‚Äôs horrible!!! I misplaced trains SEVERAL times because of the new layout! It‚Äôs awful!!
I LOVE this game but the new update has made it impossible to play. Connections drop, I get replaced by a bot WHILE in the game. I haven‚Äôt been able to complete a full game in a week
this year the game freezes, disconnects and crashes frequently.   This wasn‚Äôt always a problem but right now it‚Äôs pretty unplayable.

title.label: Crashes on iPhone SE for online

content.label: Crashes every other turn for iPhone SE (2020). It‚Äôs a good game for solo, but basically unusable for playing against another registered player online, which is what we got it for.

I like the original game, especially the fact that all the scoring is done automatically. However, I bought the Pennsylvania add-on, and I don‚Äôt like it at all. It adds a complication to the game where you have to buy stock shares of railroads. I played it once and will never play it again.
It keeps getting hanged when I am waiting for other players to join the online game. So I have to get back and play with random selections of the paths. It is so annoying!

I really enjoy this game but am finding the app very frustrating to use. It crashes often without reason, freezes, and will not alert you to your turn even if you are in game (you have to force quit the app to get it to switch to your turn), which, especially in timed multiplayer play, is really frustrating.

The online version is not good if your colorblind at all. On the normal board there are symbols that tell you what the track is if you can‚Äôt tell the color. In the regular game there are also black train cars, but for some reason they decided to use purple instead. The purple trains look identical to the blue ones and the red and green also look almost the same. 

There‚Äôs no way to tell either the trains or tracks apart if you can‚Äôt clearly see the colors. There have been numerous games where I thought I had a chance, only to collect 6 orange cards when I needed green or when I think I‚Äôve completed a path, only to find out it was a competitors train in the middle.

Add a color blind assist feature!!!

I bought this app yesterday, and there are just too many glitches for it to be worth it. It won‚Äôt register all of the cards in my hand. 

For example: when I try to plan 5 pink trains and it shows 5 pink cards in my hand, it will say I need one more train. I have list games over this.

Also, twice it hasn‚Äôt registered me completing a route that I had completed. Both of these glitches make me wish I hadn‚Äôt bought this game or the expensive expansions. 

On top of the glitches, the general layout of the chat/game features are unintuitive and generally hard to use. My husband wanted to play me and I told him not to download the app and I give you the same advice.
Great
Love this game!

It‚Äôs fun but, for a paid game, it‚Äôs really unstable. The app must be restarted for apparently random reasons. It crashes. The card icons used to play the game often don‚Äôt appear, making it unusable. I have informed Apple of these issues.

title.label: Great game but it has recently started crashing

content.label:
Great game, we own all the maps.  Recently our local multiplayer games have frozen quite a bit.  It thinks someone has left and then we they come back, it won‚Äôt let play continue.   

iPhone 10 and 1st gen iPad Pro 9.7.
It‚Äôs good I like it but not love it I just like it

title.label: Love the game but I have a suggestion

content.label:
My wife and I love the app and the board game. We play Local often and I wish we could just hit rematch after a game, have more control over colors and avatars, and have a way to let the person who joins go first. So far, we‚Äôve needed to start local games from my Mac instead of our phones/I pass. It would also be good to be able to see destination cards full screen on the phone. Germany cards are hard to read when the destination is another country,

Finally the solo game tends to crash at the very end, after the scores are up. So when I restart, it resumes at the last turn. Not fatal but slightly annoying.
Nothing more to it god loves you

title.label: Fun game to play with friends and family

content.label:
We own the Europe version of the board game, and I don‚Äôt usually like to pay for apps, but this game is well worth the money. 

It‚Äôs fun to play with friends that you invite, and to play public games as well, with or without people that you know. The online play takes a little getting used to, with the karma and the ranking, but we‚Äôve played this a bunch. It‚Äôs a great pandemic game, and even after, it‚Äôs nice to not have to something keeping track of your score :)

title.label: Fun game to play as a family

content.label: I‚Äôve never played the actual board game, but the app version is a lot of fun for the family to play together. Thanks for supporting family sharing and keeping it fun after all these years.
After the last update the app keeps crashing.

Garbage app that never works. Tried repeatedly to host a game to play with family online and it never worked. Constantly got error messages and the game dropped random players. Waste of time and money.

I love playing, many times I have issues with the online play when trying to create a game it doesn‚Äôt let me hit create also it freezes up and starts again and again it kicks me out of online play and sort of restarts the screen. It‚Äôs not an internet issue on my end I know for a fact. Please FIX it I love the game.

I‚Äôm unable to type any messages. Looks like my text color is white on a white background. I‚Äôm also finding that my number of games isn‚Äôt rising even when I win games. Otherwise, it‚Äôs enjoyable.
Love this game. It‚Äôs so fun alone with the boys or friends and family !
There are some glitches that have made this game annoying. I hope they do some updating to make it better

I have no apps that crash as much as this one. Actually, I think this is the only app I have that crashes. I have reinstalled it at least 6 times, and it just keeps crashing and crashing. 

Your games are amazing, why such crappy apps?
SUPER glitchy sometimes. I‚Äôll be playing a game and then the whistle blows and then the game freezes

It‚Äôs a great game but I hope you can make a slight improvement to the app. The board game has icons along each route that indicate the color. Unfortunately this detail was not carried over in the app making it impossible to distinguish the green and orange tiles from each other.
Can you make this simple update to help the significant percentage of color blind people out there?

title.label: Accepted some issues but now it‚Äôs just useless

content.label:
I have accepted local game disconnecting, local game crashes, no way to resume local game. 
Now game kicks you out from local game to some online game overlay while in game, repeatedly and prevent to play at all.
Such great alternative to board version I have and so terrible implementation. :(
When playing locally with two iPads, we constantly get disconnected and can‚Äôt resume the game.

title.label: Online is completely broken for iPhone

content.label:
Online is completely broken for iPhone players.

Can not host or connect to any games at all.

This is the most glitchy app I‚Äôve ever seen. It routinely freezes and force closes the app, or it will close out of a game you‚Äôre playing to try to get you to play an online game. Borderline unplayable and unacceptable for a game that costs $7 just for the base map.

title.label: Thank you for fixing the ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs Your Turn‚Äù banner

content.label: An earlier update created annoying prompt that interrupted play and ruined the game for me. Fortunately, the developers listened and fixed the issue. Thank you.
